p: The Gaussia luciferase assay was performed as previously described [ 28]. Briefly, 50 ÂµL of viral culture medium was examined using the BioLux Gaussia Luciferase Assay Kit (NEB, Ipswich, MA, USA), and the relative light units (RLU) were detected using SIRIUS L Luminometer (Titerteck Berthold, Bad Wildbad, Germany).
